DOC.detailed_description: Optimizing Vitamin D status pregnancy think maternal , fetal , neonatal benefit . Studies suggest Vitamin D act well beyond commonly think role establish calcium homeostasis maintain maternal neonatal skeletal integrity . Vitamin D also find modulate maternal renal renin-angiotensin system , maternal immune response , placental implantation function , angiogenesis . In light , surprise 2010 systematic review vitamin D pregnancy suggest Vitamin D deficiency may associate increase risk maternal neonatal morbidity . For example , vitamin D deficiency correlate array maternal condition , include gestational hypertension , preeclampsia , gestational diabetes , myopathy , vaginal infection , mental disease . Associated neonatal risk include preterm birth , immunosuppression , infection , low birth weight , hypokalemia , neonatal seizure , asthma , fracture rickets . Unfortunately , Vitamin D deficiency pregnancy ongoing epidemic , affect many 82 % pregnant woman . While study Vitamin D supplementation pregnancy consistently show associated increase maternal neonatal serum Vitamin D level , study also suggest concurrent decrease adverse maternal neonatal outcome . For example , Vitamin D supplementation pregnancy know deficiency show decrease incidence preeclampsia much 32 % . Other study , hand , suggest benefit . The inconsistency finding lie fact study primarily observational nature plague small sample size , recall bias , inability adjust potential confounders . Given , interpretation regard clinical significance limit , prevent provider make appropriate recommendation patient . As , American Congress Obstetricians Gynecologists ( ACOG ) call high quality study address whether use Vitamin D supplementation beyond find prenatal vitamin beneficial . In effort elucidate potential benefit Vitamin D supplementation unscreened population , investigator propose conduct randomize control trial Vitamin D prophylaxis provide cohort pregnant woman regardless Vitamin D status . The aim study , therefore , : Specific Aim 1 : Determine Vitamin D prophylaxis pregnant woman decrease incidence hypertensive disorder pregnancy . Specific Aim 2 : Compare neonatal outcomes receive Vitamin D prophylaxis receive Vitamin D prophylaxis . Specific Aim 3 : Compare placental histology inflammatory marker receive Vitamin D prophylaxis receive Vitamin D prophylaxis .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old With confirmed intrauterine pregnancy , less 16 week gestation Carrying singleton gestation Taking Vitamin D supplementation outside prenatal vitamin Has know disorder affect vitamin D level ( i.e , hyperparathyroidism , malabsorption disorder , history gastric bypass surgery , immunocompromised state , maternal use immunemodulators etc . ) Carrying fetus know aneuploidy anomaly With fetal demise Women chronic diuretic cardiac medication therapy include calcium channel blocker
